  • Classes in util used by util 
    Class and Description
    Class
    An Enum to represent all Classes, that are available in the game.
    Item
    An abstract Class to define an Item.
    SubTree
    A Class, which Objects represent a Range of Stats, that an Item might occur with.
    Tree
    A Tree, that defines a possible Combination of Stats, an Item may have as well as well as the Dropchance of this Item.
